features: QUICK HEAT UP TIME — 5-ounce capacity water tank heats up in just 30 seconds and provides up to 11 minutes of continuous steam
DESIGNED FOR TRAVEL — The slim, lightweight design allows you to refresh your clothes anywhere you go without the need for an ironing board.
NATURAL FABRIC CARE — More effective and gentler on fabrics than ironing for chemical-free garment care using the power of steam.
EQUIPPED FOR THE JOB — A 7.5-foot power cord, on-demand steam button, automatic shutoff, and a removable water tank all combine to make NOMAD the perfect travel companion.
SUPERIOR SUPPORT — Supported by a customer service team based in Andover, KS
Built to meet U. S. voltage requirements. Certified, safety-tested, and warrantied for use only in the U. S.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pack & go steam experience. Don't let Nomad's compact size trick you into thinking it isn't rich in features. Heating up in only 30 seconds, the Nomad's green light lets you know the 5 ounce water tank with 10 minute continuous steam duration is ready to release all the wrinkles in your outfit. With a removable tank and 7.5 foot power cord, steaming on the go has never been easier. Nomad is the slimmest garment steamer you can buy – packing 800 Watts of steam power into a compact shape that fits easily into your luggage. No space is wasted with its flat, rectangular design, which also adds durability while traveling. Compact, lightweight and durable. Nomad goes with you anywhere you want to flatten wrinkles and freshen up your outfit.

Wrinkle-free wanderlust. Your stylish sidekick on the go. The quintessential companion for on-the-go professionals, adventure seekers, and anyone else looking to stay wrinkle-free on the go. With all the features you need packed into the slimmest garment steamer you can buy, the Nomad's convenient and powerful continuous steam output will remove wrinkles and freshen up your wardrobe, no matter where you are. Masterfully balancing portability and capacity, the Nomad is designed for the road ahead - with all its distractions. Don't worry about forgetting to leave it on: the Nomad shuts off automatically after 10 minutes. Advanced Features 5.0 oz. water tank 30 sec. heating time 10 min. steam duration Continuous steam 7.5 ft. power cord 10 min. auto-shutoff

Compact and powerful. We packed 800 Watts of wrinkle-releasing power into the slimmest garment steamer you can buy. The Nomad comes equipped with a 5 ounce removable water tank boasting a 10 minute steam duration, giving you ample time to remove wrinkles from multiple garments in your suitcase or closet. Quickly steam on the go. This compact and powerful steamer offers a multitude of features to ensure you always look your best. The green indicator light lets you know it's time to remove some wrinkles. With a quick 30-second heat-up time, this steamer gets you ready to tackle those stubborn wrinkles in a flash. Wrinkle-free freedom. Don't let fabric care disrupt your routine. Equipped with a generous 7.5 foot power cord, this travel garment steamer provides the freedom to maneuver and remove wrinkles with ease. For your peace of mind, the steamer is equipped with a 10-minute auto shut-off feature.

Virtuoso Garment Steamer Valet Garment Steamer Nomad Garment Steamer Water Capacity 10 oz 7 oz 5 oz Heating Time 30 seconds 30 seconds 30 seconds Steam Duration 15 minutes 13 minutes 10 minutes Weight 1.78 lbs 1.42 lbs 1.45 lbs Dimensions 9.5" H x 6.07" D x 4.46" W 8.82" H x 5.5" D x 3.62" W 7.56" H x 4.92" D x 1.99" W Auto Shutoff 20 minutes 20 minutes 10 minutes Water Fill Method Direct Fill Direct Fill Direct Fill

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Almost the right size to use as a portable traveling steamer
reviews.reviewText: On my travels, one of the biggest things that I struggle with is having wrinkled clothes. Especially formal clothing for special events or outings. This steamer is almost the ideal size that I want for when I'm traveling, but it's just big enough that it can be a challenge to pack among other items, so this tends to stay at home. Nonetheless, this steamer does a great job at getting the wrinkles out of my clothes. Easy and straightforward to use. Just fill up the refillable tank with water, power the steamer up, wait for it to heat the water up and start steaming. I just wish it came with some sort of bag to store it, but I was able to find one to keep the steamer from getting damaged or scratched when not in use.One thing to keep in mind. I recommend using distilled water to help prevent any sort of mineral buildup that may occur when using tap water or another source of water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very portable and efficient
reviews.reviewText: This steamer is great it is very small and portable and works really well. The steamer is quick to warm and does an excellent job at removing wrinkles and producing steam. Like with all other steamers, make sure to use distilled or RO water to prevent mineral buildup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy and effective!
reviews.reviewText: I'm terrible at ironing. I actually iron wrinkles that weren't there before into my clothes, so I love steaming them instead! The NOMAD steamer is super simple to use and operate. Once you fill the removable tank with distilled water (important not to use tap water), just press the power button and you're ready to steam in under a minute! And, if you're absentminded like I am, you'll appreciate that it shuts itself off after ten minutes if not switched off manually.It's not as powerful as a standing steamer, obviously, but it's still quite effective with several passes in each area. I was somewhat misled by the "travel" size aspect since I thought it would be smaller than the other handheld steamer I have, which is too bulky to pack if I'm only taking a carry-on, which is all the time now. It's "travel" size in comparison to a standard full-size steamer, but still not quite small enough for me to take on quick trips, but that's because I tend to pack so light. Overall, if you're sick of ironing, or tired of hauling around a standing steamer, switch to this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect portable steamer
reviews.reviewText: Steamfast NOMAD Handheld Travel Garment Steamer is well built and heats up quickly. I recommend only using distilled water in it as I noticed using tap water was causing it to sputter the water out a bit. Overall this is great portable steamer perfectly fit in my luggage on a recent road trip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice little compact steamer; still a little large for travel
reviews.reviewText: I became an iron-to-steamer convert several years ago and have no plans of going back! When I'm at home, I use a full-size upright steamer from Steam and Go, but I've been on the lookout for a travel steamer for a while now.This compact steamer from Steamfast is quite small & compact, especially compared to the other "travel" models I've seen here on Amazon. The steamer & cord fit comfortably into a carry-on bag or full-size suitcase, so it is perfect for travel. While it is quite a bit smaller than some of the other compact steamers out there, I still kind of wish it was even smaller. As it is, I will probably only take the unit with me when traveling domestically, and probably won't take it with me on flights.As far as the functionality, the unit works great and is very simple to operate. As soon as you plug it in, it starts heating for steam. To release the steam, just press the green trigger. The tank holds just enough to get several garments done at once and is pretty easy to refill as well.Overall, pretty happy with this little steamer. While I do wish it was just a tiny bit smaller, I think it's a great option for travel, and the price is competitive at the sub-$40 list price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is awesome for traveling or four quick touchups at home
reviews.reviewText: I really like this steamer because it is very lightweight. Easy to use and can travel with you when you are out and about. It is also nice for home use as it has a plug-in as well as quick response to get the steam flowing. I use it to up date my dry, clean clothes when they might have a wrinkle are too specially my suits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid garment steamer but a bit heavy
reviews.reviewText: This review is for: Steamfast NOMAD Handheld Travel Garment Steamer, WhiteOverall this is a very effective steamer and solid build and you know it when you pick it up for the first time.Pros:- heats up really fast after you turn it on- no leaking of water bc of design- can be used sideways or downwards too like you’re ironing- does a good job at getting wrinkles out- doesn’t splatter water like other steamersCons:- can feel a bit heavy when doing more than one garment- not lightweight nor compact for traveling- a bit awkward in how you can only lay it on its side only when steaming and not upright because the cord sits right on one of its legs- THE MAJOR CON for me was that you must keep pressing the steam button for steam to come out and this can get tiringFor $29.99, this is a solid garment steamer but not as ergonomically well designed since it’s a bit heavy and to steam you must repeatedly push a button.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like a charm
reviews.reviewText: The picture above is what a few passes of the steamer can do. I don't have an iron, haven't had one in years, but needed to be an adult and get one. Before I did, I saw this and figured I'd give it a try. Definitely worth it. It takes about the same amount of time as an iron to get clothing completely wrinkle free, but without the risk of you accidentally damaging your favorite top.The manual says to use distilled water. If you can't, just be sure to clean it thoroughly after every use because minerals from tap or bottled water can build up inside of it, causing the life of it to shorten.
